HelpEntry.Text: The name of the merchant table. This will be used to identify the table.

The amount of this item that the merchant will have for sale from this table. If set to -1 then it will always have it. If set to a number above 0 it will only have those amounts for sale. If all gets bought it will only refresh when the refresh time has run out.
How long it takes to add one item up to the count number (if there is a count limit set)
Adds another item field to this table.
